summary: This is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York discussing a cooperator with urgent information about Jeffrey Epstein. The tone is informal, referencing a Stephen King book and containing the phrase 'LOLZ'.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender/recipient of the email discussing a cooperator with information about Epstein. The specific name is redacted.

events.title: Email about Epstein cooperator
events.description: Assistant United States Attorneys in the SDNY exchange emails about a cooperator who has urgent information regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain between federal prosecutors discussing a cooperator with 'urgent' information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The email was sent on August 28, 2019, shortly after Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The informal tone and use of 'LOLZ' and references to a Stephen King book suggest casual internal communication among prosecutors.
All specific names of the prosecutors involved are redacted in the provided text.
The email indicates an active investigative interest in Epstein-related information at the time.
